{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Heartbeat | class = HereticSoundSequence5 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1204 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence5</u>
Plays sound sequence number 4 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence5</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 4 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Heartbeat environment 4 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playtime world/amb5 35 playtime world/amb5 35 playtime world/amb5 35 playuntildone world/amb5 end
